result.purpose: Responsible for the task server application, including configuration management, dependency injection, and server initialization.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, utilizing dependency injection for managing components and services.

cmd/task_server/config.go.purpose: Configuration management for task server components and services.

cmd/task_server/main.go.purpose: Main entry point for the task server application, initializing configuration, logging, and starting the server.

cmd/task_server/wire.go.purpose: This file sets up dependency injection for the task server using Google Wire.

cmd/task_server/wire_gen.go.purpose: Generates dependency injection code for the task server using Wire.
